dmg:connectedapp:create.description: create a connected app in your org. Credit sfdx-waw-plugin for base code https://github.com/wadewegner/sfdx-waw-plugin

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

scopes.name: scopes
scopes.description: scopes separated by commas (defaut: Api, Web, RefreshToken; valid: Basic, Api, Web, Full, Chatter, CustomApplications, RefreshToken, OpenID, CustomPermissions, Wave, Eclair)

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

base64column.name: base64column
base64column.description: column header with base64 data in it

filenamecolumn.name: filenamecolumn
filenamecolumn.description: column header with file name in it

loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

htmlcolumns.name: htmlcolumns
htmlcolumns.description: comma-separated list of columns with rich text

filenamecolumn.name: filenamecolumn
filenamecolumn.description: column with base64 text for file

base64column.name: base64column
base64column.description: column header with base64 data in it

dmg:workbench:open.description: open workbench using the current target username (from waw plugin). Credit sfdx-waw-plugin for base code https://github.com/wadewegner/sfdx-waw-plugin

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

setdefaultworkbenchurl.name: setdefaultworkbenchurl
setdefaultworkbenchurl.description: store the workbench url as default
